scenario.name: The Rise of a New Giant
scenario.description: The year is 2003. The airline industry is thriving and reaching new, yet unseen frontiers. It's the best moment to jump in and make a fortune. You have been elected as a CEO of a new airline called WizzAir and your goal is to become the biggest airline in Europe based on number of routes and wealth. However, your work will not be as easy as you may think. There is too much competition on the market, and Ryanair just strenghtened their position on the European Aviation market. You have to find a way to dominate all of your oponents and conquer the market by creating better coverage all over Europe with fiendlier prices. But be careful, the others will try to supress you by trying to create more lines, lovering their prices, and, maybe creating lines there, where you would like to do so too.
